data.message: Looks like coke is now competing with Pepsi for the worst commercial.

replies.message: Why worst?
Obviously you don't make adverts for a living and there is a good reason why.
What is the reason tho?
Lol
Nah, he's jealous he didn't get to the pool boy first
Meh Pepsi will always win worst advert.
Ahmed I'll take it you do design adverts then? Cmon give us your reason
I disagree with this comment and I Come from a design industry. Lol
Since everyone seems to be concerned about the reason here is one, I believe advertising your product by sexualising any gender is lack of creativity.
True Ahmed. Sexualising any gender is just scumbag. However because it's a man being sexualised and not a woman it's okay apparently.
Why? I thinks it's a great commercial

>you think
Isn't there empirical data on what techniques work in advertising?
It's better than someone suggesting that Pepsi will solve racism though
Sex sells. Always has. And I hate it. But I love this ad because its humorous and inclusive without making it a big deal. Its not actually using sex to sell the product but the competition.
If coke was serious for that title, you would have seen Kayne make an appearance
Selling something like this is pandering but it's far more pandering and pathetic to do what pepsi tried to do.
I wouldn't say he's being objectified here. They're trying to impress him because he's attractive to the characters in the ad.
Joseph - who's it pandering to? 🤔

Cocoa cola is one of VERY few brands that don't actually have much on their adverts as they don't need it. The way they do it, have done it and built their brand is phenomenal. They're advert pretty much says "its Coke, you know you want it" 

He isn't being objectified, there are much worse adverts out there for this. Actually have a look round at this. Both male and female, race, sexual orientation. All sorts.
Shut up
Lauren Frances Eve Barlow I completely agree. I hate how much I love Coke Ads. They're so iconic and don't even need an introduction just that little jingle and their slogan.
Ahmed AK Khawaja so I assume you're opposed to the Karl's jr. Ads as well then? Or is that ok because you're hetero?

Exactly. If you look through their adverts over the past 50+ and how they've done every single one. They have the best of the best working for them. It'd be amazing to be apart of that. Especially when Ive worked along Vimto aswell. Its just fantastic stuff
